generated_class_comment:
/**
 * The AllergyBean class represents an object that stores information about a patient's allergy.
 * This class includes methods to retrieve and set the unique identifier, patient ID, description, and first found date of the allergy.
 * The class also provides a method to convert the first found date into a formatted string.
 * 
 * The main functionalities of the AllergyBean class include:
 * - Retrieving and setting the unique identifier associated with the allergy
 * - Retrieving and setting the patient's unique identifier
 * - Retrieving and setting the description of the allergy
 * - Retrieving and setting the date when the allergy was first found
 * - Converting the first found date into a formatted string in the format "MM/dd/yyyy"
 * 
 * The behavior of the AllergyBean class is as follows:
 * - The constructor initializes a new instance of the AllergyBean class with default values.
 * - The getDescription and setDescription methods allow for retrieving and setting the description of the allergy.
 * - The getFirstFound and setFirstFound methods enable the retrieval and setting of the first found date of the allergy.
 * - The getId and setId methods facilitate the retrieval and setting of the unique identifier associated with the allergy.
 * - The getPatientID and setPatientID methods allow for retrieving and setting the patient's unique identifier.
 * - The getFirstFoundStr method converts the first found date into a formatted string.
 * 
 * This class provides a comprehensive set of functionalities for managing allergy information and interacting with allergy data.
 */
